definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The water gurgled as it ran down the plug-hole.
sentences.chinese: 水汨汨地从塞孔中流下去。

sentences.english: His poetic achievement stands at the center of modern literature.
sentences.chinese: 他是最优秀的英文诗人之一，是现代文学的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Let the rainwater run through this pipe.
sentences.chinese: 让雨水从这个管道中流过去。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon described the queen as an anchor for our age.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文称女王为这个时代的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Historically, conscription was the mainstay of PLA recruitment.
sentences.chinese: 历史上，义务兵一直是解放军的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: We are Noodle people. Broth escapes scampers deep through our veins.
sentences.chinese: 我们是面条家族，血管中流着面汤。

sentences.english: Does anyone remember the mid-stream water, waves to suppress Feizhou?
sentences.chinese: 曾记否，到中流击水，浪遏飞舟？

sentences.english: Flow voids are often seen in these very vascular tumors.
sentences.chinese: 在这种富血供的肿块中流空是常见的。

sentences.english: Lumen Depreciation is the decrease in lumen output that occurs as a lamp operates.
sentences.chinese: 流明衰减发生在灯泡点亮过程中流明输出的减少。

sentences.english: A fountain will flow out of the LORD'S house and will water the valley of acacias .
sentences.chinese: 必有泉源从耶和华的殿中流出来，滋润什亭谷。

sentences.english: The Compton brothers were mainstays of the Arsenal side in the 1940s.
sentences.chinese: 坎普顿兄弟是阿森纳40年代的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Sped by wind and current, the boat moved toward midstream.
The stream flowed over its slim sandwich of mud and stones.
sentences.chinese: 小溪在那浅浅的泥石混杂的河道中流着。

sentences.english: Transmigration midstream Cheng He in years.
sentences.chinese: 灾岁月悳轮回中流成河。

sentences.english: The sea water is carried along with the exhaust from the water-lift chamber out the exhaust pipe.
sentences.chinese: 海水在排气的作用下，从水提升仓室中流到排气管中。

sentences.english: America is still and always will be the bastion for Freedomand Democracy.
sentences.chinese: 美国迄今并永远是自由和民主的中流砥柱。

definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to overflow/transverse flow/to flow over/cross flow
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
fluent with words/words flowing like pearl beads
